trans-unit.source: A Python library to control and monitor LIFX bulbs
trans-unit.target: 用于控制和监控LIFX灯泡的Python库。

trans-unit.source: A Python library to control and monitor LIFX bulbs. Also provides a workaround for users having issues with controlling LIFX bulbs on their network.
trans-unit.target: 一个用于控制和监控LIFX灯泡的Python库。同时也为在网络上控制LIFX灯泡有问题的用户提供了一个变通方法。

trans-unit.source: Allows the LIFX bulb smartphone app to work by “faking” a bulb and relaying commands to the real one (see examples/bridge.py).
trans-unit.target: Allows the LIFX bulb smartphone app to work by “faking” a bulb and relaying commands to the real one (see examples/bridge.py).

trans-unit.source: Auto-discovery of bulbs (yes, should have been there already).
trans-unit.target: 自动发现灯泡(对,应该已经有了)。

trans-unit.source: Contributors: Deryck Arnold, Michael Farrell (micolous)
trans-unit.target: 撰稿人:Deryck Arnold、Michael Farrell(micolous)Deryck Arnold,Michael Farrell (micolous)

trans-unit.source: Current features:
trans-unit.target: 目前的特点:

trans-unit.source: Ensure you have the Python setuptools.
trans-unit.target: 确保你有Python setuptools。

trans-unit.source: Get Python (tested with 2.7, others may work). I use the Python(x, y) distribution.
trans-unit.target: 获取Python (用2.7测试,其他的可能也可以)。我使用Python(x,y)发行版。

trans-unit.source: GitHub: https://github.com/derkarnold/pylifx PyPi: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/pylifx
trans-unit.target: GitHub: https://github.com/derkarnold/pylifx PyPi: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/pylifx

trans-unit.source: Gives the ability to display the contents of LIFX messages coming through. ** Huge thanks to magicmonkey and the lifxjs project for their hard work on working out the LIFX protocol.
trans-unit.target: 提供了显示LIFX消息内容的功能。**非常感谢magicmonkey和lifxjs项目在LIFX协议上所做的努力。

trans-unit.source: How to install:
trans-unit.target: 如何安装。

trans-unit.source: Huge thanks to Kevin Bowman(magicmonkey) and others for the lifxjs project on GitHub:
trans-unit.target: 非常感谢Kevin Bowman(magicmonkey)等人在GitHub上的lifxjs项目。

trans-unit.source: Linux users - ensure you have python-dev installed (for the netifaces package).
trans-unit.target: Linux用户--确保你已经安装了python-dev(用于netifaces包)。

trans-unit.source: Originally written to allow the LIFX bulb to work in non-standard networks, but it is growing to be much more.
trans-unit.target: 原本是为了让LIFX灯泡能在非标准网络中工作而写的,但它的作用越来越大。

trans-unit.source: Run “easy_install pylifx” from a command prompt or terminal.
trans-unit.target: Run “easy_install pylifx” from a command prompt or terminal.

trans-unit.source: Support for more than one bulb per bridge (waiting on another bulb to arrive).
trans-unit.target: 支持每个桥接一个以上的灯泡(等待另一个灯泡的到来)。

trans-unit.source: The ability to run “scenes” - provide a dictionary of times and colours and the library will do the rest (see examples/sunrise.py).
trans-unit.target: The ability to run “scenes” - provide a dictionary of times and colours and the library will do the rest (see examples/sunrise.py).

trans-unit.source: Two common issues with installing:
trans-unit.target: 安装时常见的两个问题。

trans-unit.source: Upcoming features:
trans-unit.target: 即将推出的功能。

trans-unit.source: Windows users - install the pre-built binaries for your python distribution using the links in the following URL: http://alastairs-place.net/projects/netifaces/ (The section is just above the start of the Changelog section).
trans-unit.target: Windows users - install the pre-built binaries for your python distribution using the links in the following URL: http://alastairs-place.net/projects/netifaces/ (The section is just above the start of the Changelog section).

trans-unit.source: Without their work on the lifxjs project, this one would not have been possible.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有他们在lifxjs项目上的工作,这个项目就不可能实现。

trans-unit.source: You’re done.
trans-unit.target: 你完成了。
